item.title: 大量寻求庇护者涌入加拿大，城市为此付出代价
item.description: 寻求庇护的新移民人数激增，创下历史新高，加拿大各大城市不堪重负，预算紧张，临时庇护所也不堪重负。【原文：Canadian cities are being overwhelmed by a record surge of newcomers seeking asylum, straining their budgets and pushing temporary shelters beyond their limits.】

item.title: 亿万富翁史蒂夫-科恩认为每周四天工作制即将到来
item.description: 亿万富翁史蒂夫-科恩（Steve Cohen）说，他预计将有更多企业改用每周四天工作制，这也是他投资高尔夫的原因之一。【原文：Billionaire Steve Cohen said he expects that more businesses will move to a four-day work week, one of the reasons he’s made investments in golf.】

item.title: 赞比亚与部分剩余债权人达成债务协议
item.description: 赞比亚财政部长费利克斯-恩库卢库萨（Felix Nkulukusa）表示，在与官方贷款人和债券持有人达成协议后，赞比亚即将与剩余的一些商业债权人达成债务重组协议。【原文：Zambia is close to reaching debt restructuring deals with some of its remaining commercial creditors following agreements with official lenders and bondholders, said Felix Nkulukusa, secretary to the Treasury.】

item.title: 美联储主席博斯蒂克预计今年第四季度将降息一次
item.description: 亚特兰大联邦储备银行行长拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）表示，在第四季度降低利率可能是合适的，并强调了通胀进展的颠簸性。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta President Raphael Bostic said it will likely be appropriate to lower interest rates in the fourth quarter, emphasizing the bumpy nature of inflation progress.】

item.title: 耶伦在中国之行中关注有价值的资产：透视经济
item.description: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）和她的团队希望，在一系列双边会谈的基础上，他们九个月来对中国的第二次访问将为了解世界第二大经济体的真实状况提供有价值的线索。【原文：US Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen and her team are hoping their second visit to China in nine months, building on a series of bilateral talks, will yield valuable clues to the true state of the world’s No. 2 economy — even if no significant policy agreements are anticipated.】

item.title: 加纳考虑提高可可出场价以遏制走私
item.description: 加纳正在考虑为可可豆向农民支付高达两倍的价格，以阻止他们以更高的价格向邻国出售可可豆。【原文：Ghana is considering paying cocoa farmers up to twice as much for their beans in order to stop them from selling to neighboring countries for higher prices — the latest in a series of repercussions following a global shortage.】

item.title: ADP 数据显示，3 月份美国公司新增就业岗位 18.4 万个
item.description: 上个月，美国公司的招聘人数创下了自 7 月份以来的最大增幅，而且一些公司的工资涨幅也有所加快，这表明对工人的需求十分强劲。【原文：US companies boosted hiring last month by the most since July in a broad advance and some wage gains accelerated, pointing to solid demand for workers.】

item.title: 镓的价格因中国限制出口而翻了一番多
item.description: 镓的价格接近 2011 年以来的最高点，因为中国的出口限制抑制了全球供应，并损害了大量高科技应用中所用金属的买家。【原文：Prices for gallium are close to their highest since 2011 as China’s export restrictions crimp global supply and hurt buyers of the metal used in a swathe of high-tech applications.】

item.title: 软件制造商的人工智能竞赛需要投资者耐心等待
item.description: 投资者需要更多的耐心，才能让人工智能的兴奋情绪提振软件制造商的股票。【原文：Investors need more patience for the euphoria about artificial intelligence to lift the stocks of software makers.】

item.title: 俄罗斯三月份石油和天然气预算收益几乎翻了一番

item.title: 皮尔-亨特称英国小盘股指数即将消亡

item.title: NFL 头盔制造商 Riddell 从 BC Partners 获得 4 亿美元投资
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社看到的一份声明，BC Partners 的信贷部门同意向足球头盔制造商 Riddell 提供 4 亿美元，这笔交易将使包括私募股权公司 Fenway Partners 在内的股东获得期待已久的回报。【原文：The credit arm of BC Partners agreed to provide $400 million to football helmet maker Riddell, in a deal that will give shareholders including private equity firm Fenway Partners a long-awaited payout, according to a statement seen by Bloomberg News.】
